titleStmt.title: A verie plaine and well grownded treatise concerninge Baptisme VVherein yt is verie clearlie shovven, & out of good growndes demonstrated that Baptisme was instituted & ordayned by the Lorde Christ for thoese that beleeve and repente, and was so taught and vsed by his Apostells & observed and followed by the Primative Churche. As also hovv that in processe of time the Baptisme of children in steede of true Baptisme was brought in and received and by divers cownsells popes, and emperors commaunded to be observed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the yeare of our Lorde and Sauiour Iesus Christ,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by STC.
Identified as STC 24662a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
